TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionAuthenticationModule extends System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase

summary.span: 实现一个 在 ws-discovery 方案下处理会话 cookies 的 ASP.NET 模块。

span.span: Implements an ASP.NET module that processes session cookies in WS-Federation scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 ASP.NET 管道中存在时, ( SAM) 处理 ws-federation 方案中的会话 cookie。When present in the ASP.NET pipeline, the (SAM) processes session cookies in WS-Federation scenarios. 它使用属性指定的 cookie 处理程序从 http 请求中读取原始会话 cookie, 并将其写入 http 响应。It uses the cookie handler specified by the property to read the raw session cookie from the HTTP request and write it to the HTTP response. 它使用为应用程序配置的, 将原始会话 cookie 反序列化为对象。It uses the that is configured for an application to deserialize the raw session cookie into objects. 会话安全令牌包含与要为其提供请求的实体关联的声明 () 和主体 ()。The session security token contains the claims () and principal () associated with the entity for which the request is being served. SAM 将其事件处理程序添加到 ASP.NET 管道中的事件。The SAM adds its event handler to the event in the ASP.NET pipeline. 此处理程序截获登录请求, 如果存在会话 cookie, 则将其反序列化为会话令牌, 并将和属性设置为会话令牌中包含的声明主体。This handler intercepts sign-in requests, and, if there is a session cookie, deserializes it into a session token, and sets the and properties to the claims principal contained in the session token. 在此过程中, 它将调用 SAM 公开的几个其他方法。It invokes several of the other methods exposed by the SAM during this process. 可以调用方法将用户从会话中注销 (例如, 在 SignOut.aspx.cs 代码隐藏文件中)。The method can be invoked to sign the user out of a session (for example, in a SignOut.aspx.cs code-behind file). SAM 公开了若干事件, 这些事件可提供对其处理管道的访问权限。The SAM exposes several events that provide access to its processing pipeline. 和事件使你可以修改从 cookie 读取或在处理过程中创建的会话令牌。The and events enable you to modify session tokens that are read from cookies or created during processing. 通常, 这样做是为了在令牌中添加、删除或转换声明, 或调整其过期时间。Typically, this is done to add, remove, or transform claims in the token or to adjust its expiration time. 、和事件为处理注销请求提供挂钩。 The , , and events provide hooks into the processing of sign-out requests. 在许多情况下, 只需将这些事件的处理程序添加到 global.asax.cs 文件即可。For many scenarios, simply adding handlers for these events, often to the global.asax.cs file, will be sufficient. 对于更复杂的方案, 可以从派生, 以实现自定义 SAM。For more complicated scenarios, you can derive from to implement a custom SAM. 为此, 将公开和 中调用的许多方法, 以便在会话处理生命周期的特定阶段提供自定义行为。To this end, many of the methods that are invoked during and are exposed so that you can provide custom behavior at specific stages of the session processing lifecycle. 可以通过将 SAM 添加到 iis 7 和更高版本``元素下或`` iis 7 之前的版本元素中的 HTTP 模块, 将 SAM 添加到配置文件中的 ASP.NET 管道。You can add the SAM to the ASP.NET pipeline in a configuration file by adding it to the HTTP modules under either the `` element for IIS version 7 and later or under the `` element for versions prior to IIS 7. SAM 使用的 cookie 处理程序可以使用[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素进行配置。The cookie handler used by the SAM can be configured with the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSAM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#1)] 下面的 XML 演示如何配置 ASP.NET 管道中的 SAM。The following XML shows how to configure the SAM in the ASP.NET pipeline. 为了简洁起见, 此处省略了典型配置中存在的许多其他元素。Many other elements that are present in a typical configuration are omitted here for brevity. ```xml ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否应在会话 Cookie 中存储会话信息（声明值等），或是否应通过使用 Cookie 仅存储引用在服务器端上存储会话内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the session information (claim values, etc.) should be stored in the session cookie or whether the session content should be stored on the server side, using the cookie to store just a reference.

value.span: 如果发布的 cookies 在引用模式中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if issued cookies are in reference mode; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指定了发布的 cookie 不处于引用模式。

span.span: The default is , which specifies that issued cookies are not in reference mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在引用模式下, 存储在服务器端缓存中 (从派生的对象)。In reference mode, the is stored in a server-side cache (an object that derives from ). 发出的 cookie 只包含用于从缓存中检索令牌的上下文标识符。The issued cookie just contains a context identifier that is used to retrieve the token from the cache. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作, Microsoft 建议为 global.asax.cs 文件中的事件提供处理程序, 并在属性中传递的标记上设置属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌在对每个请求的引用模式下运行, 并且优于仅在会话身份验证模块上设置属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnAuthenticateRequest (object sender, EventArgs eventArgs);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAuthenticateRequest(object sender, class System.EventArgs eventArgs) cil managed
protected: virtual void OnAuthenticateRequest(System::Object ^ sender, EventArgs ^ eventArgs);
abstract member OnAuthenticateRequest : obj * EventArgs -> unit override this.OnAuthenticateRequest : obj * EventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的源。

span.span: The source for the event.

param.span: 这将是 对象。

span.span: This will be an object.

param.name: eventArgs
param.span: 事件的数据。

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 从 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 管道中处理的 事件。

span.span: Handles the event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行以下操作:This method does the following: 1. 调用方法以从会话 cookie 读取 (如果存在)。 Invokes the method to read a from the session cookie, if one is present. 2. 如果无法读取会话安全令牌 (很可能是因为尚未建立会话), 则返回。If a session security token cannot be read (most likely because a session has not been established), return. 3. 调用方法以引发事件。 Invokes the method to raise the event. 这为从 cookie 读取的令牌进行修改或取消请求提供了机会。This provides an opportunity for the token read from the cookie to be modified or for the request to be canceled. 处理程序还可以通过设置属性来指定应重新颁发令牌。The handler can also specify that the token should be reissued, by setting the property. 4. 如果要重新颁发令牌, 则将其从缓存中删除, 并调用方法来引发事件。If the token is to be reissued, removes it from the cache and invokes the method to raise the event. 这为再次修改标记提供了机会。This provides opportunity for the token to again be modified. 还可以通过在事件处理程序中设置属性来修改重新发出行为。The reissue behavior can also be modified by setting the property in the event handler. 5. 调用方法来对用户进行身份验证。Invokes the method to authenticate the user. 如果成功, 则可以将属性设置为包含在传入令牌的属性中的主体。If successful, this has the effect of setting the property to the principal that is contained in the property of the incoming token. 6. 如果会话已过期, 则调用方法。If the session has expired, invokes the method. 方法将添加到方法中事件的处理程序。 The method is added to the handlers for the event in the method.

exception.span: 没有已配置的无效会话标记处理程序。

span.span: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
(There is no configured in the property.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SessionSecurityTokenCreated As EventHandler(Of SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当会话安全标记已创建时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a session security token has been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将会话安全令牌写入 cookie 之前, 可以使用此事件来修改会话安全令牌。You can use this event to modify the session security token before it is written to a cookie. 创建会话令牌 ( ) 后, 从方法内引发事件。The event is raised from within the method after a session token () has been created. 例如, 如果事件的事件处理程序修改了标记, 则会发生这种情况。This happens, for example, if an event handler for the event modifies the token. 你可以使用此事件来修改会话令牌的属性, 然后再将其传递到管道中, 并用于对发出请求的实体 (用户) 进行身份验证。You can use this event to modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user). 在事件处理程序中, 可以通过属性访问标记。In an event handler, you can access the token through the property. 修改令牌后, 可以通过将属性设置为来`true`确保将其写回到 cookie。After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the property to `true`. 与不同的 是, 事件不是可取消的事件。Unlike, the event, is not a cancelable event. ## Examples 下面的代码演示在 ASP.NET web 应用程序的 global.asax.cs 文件中实现的事件的处理程序。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 还必须将处理程序添加到事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 概述主题中显示了一个更完整的示例。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SessionSecurityTokenReceived As EventHandler(Of SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当会话安全标记已从 cookie 读取时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a session security token has been read from a cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功从会话 cookie 读取会话令牌 () 后, 从方法中引发该事件。The event is raised from within the method after a session token () has been successfully read from the session cookie. 你可以使用此事件来修改会话令牌的属性, 然后再将其传递到管道中, 并用于对发出请求的实体 (用户) 进行身份验证。You can use this event to modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user). 最常见的一种情况涉及到修改会话过期时间 (可通过属性访问), 以覆盖通过`lifetime` [ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素。One of the most common scenarios involves modifying the session expiration time (accessible through the property) to override the session expiration time set in configuration through the `lifetime` attribute of the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element. 通过修改每个请求的此属性, 可实现滑动会话;也就是说, 每次用户访问站点时, 都会在该会话中扩展生存期。By modifying this property on each request, you can implement a sliding session; that is, a session in which the lifetime is extended each time the user accesses the site. 在事件处理程序中, 可以通过属性访问标记。In an event handler, you can access the token through the property. 修改令牌后, 可以通过将设置为来`true`确保将其写回到 cookie。After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the to `true`. 最后, 该事件是一个可取消的事件, 你可以设置的属性以中止进一步处理请求。Finally, the event is a cancelable event, and you can set the property of the to abort further processing of the request. ## Examples 下面的代码演示在 ASP.NET web 应用程序的 global.asax.cs 文件中实现的事件的处理程序。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 还必须将处理程序添加到事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 概述主题中显示了一个更完整的示例。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#5)]

abstract member SetPrincipalFromSessionToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken -> unit override this.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken -> unit

param.name: sessionSecurityToken
param.span: 从其开始设置主体的会话标识。

span.span: The session token from which to set the principal.

summary.span: 将 和 的主体设置到包含在指定会话标记的主体。

span.span: Sets the principal on the and to the principal that is contained in the specified session token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法, 并使用返回的标识设置属性和属性。 Invokes the method and sets the property and the property on using the identities that are returned. 此方法是从方法中调用的。This method is called from the method.

summary.span: 在用户注销之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the user is signed out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用方法后立即从方法引发。Raised from the method just after the method is invoked. 不保证每个会话都要调用此事件。This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session. 例如, 可以在客户端删除 cookie, 在这种情况下, 将永远不会引发此事件, 因为没有用于删除会话的服务器端事件。For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session. ## Examples 下面的代码演示在 ASP.NET web 应用程序的 global.asax.cs 文件中实现的事件的处理程序。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 还必须将处理程序添加到事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 概述主题中显示了一个更完整的示例。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#3)]

summary.span: 在删除登录会话之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before deleting the sign-in session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用方法之前从方法引发。Raised from the method just before the method is invoked. 不保证每个会话都要调用此事件。This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session. 例如, 可以在客户端删除 cookie, 在这种情况下, 将永远不会引发此事件, 因为没有用于删除会话的服务器端事件。For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session. ## Examples 下面的代码演示在 ASP.NET web 应用程序的 global.asax.cs 文件中实现的事件的处理程序。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 还必须将处理程序添加到事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 概述主题中显示了一个更完整的示例。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SignOut() cil managed
abstract member SignOut : unit -> unit override this.SignOut : unit -> unit

summary.span: 注销当前用户并引发相应事件。

span.span: Signs the current user out and raises the associated events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用、 和方法以执行注销。如果发生异常, 则调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the , , and methods to perform sign-out. If an exception occurs, the method is invoked to raise the event. 你可以设置传入此事件的事件处理程序的对象的属性, 以取消注销并防止异常传播到客户端。You can set the property of the object passed into the event handler for this event to cancel the sign-out and prevent the exception from being propagated to the client. 您可以重写此方法, 以添加特定于应用程序的行为。You can override this method to add application-specific behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了用于从 ASP.NET web 应用程序中的 SignOut 页 (SignOut.aspx.cs) 调用方法的代码。The following code shows code for invoking the method from a SignOut.aspx page (SignOut.aspx.cs) in an ASP.NET web application. 概述主题中显示了一个更完整的示例。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SignOutError As EventHandler(Of ErrorEventArgs)

summary.span: 当在注销期间有错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is an error during sign-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注销过程中出现错误时从方法引发。Raised from the method when an error occurs during sign-out. 在事件处理程序中, 您可以获取导致事件从属性引发的异常。In an event handler, you can get the exception that resulted in the event being raised from the property. 你可以通过将的 属性设置为`true`, 来取消对异常的进一步处理, 这将导致不会将异常传播到客户端。You can cancel further processing of the exception, which has the result of not propagating the exception to the client, by setting the property of the to `true`. 不保证每个会话都要调用此事件。This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session. 例如, 可以在客户端删除 cookie, 在这种情况下, 将永远不会引发此事件, 因为没有用于删除会话的服务器端事件。For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session. ## Examples 下面的代码演示在 ASP.NET web 应用程序的 global.asax.cs 文件中实现的事件的处理程序。The following code shows a handler for the event implemented in the global.asax.cs file of an ASP.NET web application. 还必须将处理程序添加到事件。You must also add the handler to the event. 概述主题中显示了一个更完整的示例。A more complete example is shown in the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WifSAM#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#2)]

returns.span: 如果从请求中成功读取了会话 cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用在属性中配置的 cookie 处理程序读取 cookie, 然后调用方法从 cookie 读取标记。Reads the cookie by using the cookie handler that is configured in the property and then invokes the method to read the token from the cookie.
